commentaries.commentary: Player #10 drives forward into attack. A precise pass finds Rafinha (#13)! He crosses, blocked! Player #7 heads it, a stunning save from the keeper!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: GOAL! Player #31! Rebound collected and smashed home! Unbelievable! What an immediate response, absolutely clinical. The stadium erupts!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: The crowd is absolutely erupting! What an incredible atmosphere! Bayern Munich players are celebrating, embracing. Player #10 joins the jubilant huddle.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Guardiola intently watching, staff animated! Bayern players celebrating! Schweinsteiger, Alaba, Mandžukić! A goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a breakthrough for Bayern! And they push again! Ribéry with a powerful low drive! But the keeper makes a spectacular save!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Here's the replay! Franck Ribéry receives a perfect pass. A clinical low shot, past the diving United keeper! Goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Absolutely no chance for the keeper there! Just brilliant execution from Ribéry. You can see the ball nestled in the net and Fellaini's disappointment. World-class finish!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: GOAL! Player 31 scores! Close-range header, right into the top corner! What a start!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Brilliant! Straight into incredible highlights. Ronaldo and Player 889's clinical finish!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2
